name: Gratified Galaxy
description:
.

.
.
.
Space isn't remote at all!
It's only an hour's drive away if your car could go straight upwards.
-Fred Hoyle                                      
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
Welcome to Gratified Galaxy!
One of the games not made for a Jam so nobody will play it..!
But why would I do such a thing? Well, since it's been one year since I've released my first game, I thought it would be nce to remake said first game.
You can play it here and let me know wich version you find better!
No sense in keeping you longe! It's right there and it's free. You can also download it if you like.
Have fun!
.
.
.
.
